alert.note: Alert for Northeastern Nye County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 23 at 2:28AM PST until February 26 at 4:00AM PST by NWS Elko
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM FRIDAY TO 4 AM PST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 10 inches for the valleys. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Northeastern Nye County. * WHEN...From 10 AM Friday to 4 AM PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...This is a very potent system that is at historic levels, travel is not advised.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
